message: I propose dividing the money with a 70-30 split in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the risk of inflation.
I'm willing to take a smaller share now, but I'll still get more than you're offering. Consider this a fair starting point.
Considering the inflation impact, I've adjusted the proposal to a 60-40 split in favor of Alice. I believe this maintains a reasonable balance while acknowledging the risk of further devaluation.
I'm still willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more given the current market conditions. This is my best offer so far.
